## Summary

- What does this PR change?
- Why is this change needed?

## Type of Change

- [ ] Bug fix
- [ ] New feature
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Refactor / cleanup

## Testing

Describe how you tested this change:

- Commands run (e.g. `make test`, `make fmt`, manual scenarios)
- Environments used (kernel version, distro, etc.)

## Screenshots / Logs (If Relevant)

Add any helpful screenshots (e.g. dashboard) or key log snippets here.

## Security Impact

- Does this change affect SPA, honeypot behavior, critical ports, or packet handling?
- If yes, describe the impact and expected behavior.

## Checklist

- [ ] I have read the `CONTRIBUTING.md` guidelines
- [ ] I have run `make fmt` on my changes
- [ ] I have run `make lint` (if available) and fixed issues
- [ ] I have run `make test` and tests pass
- [ ] I have updated documentation where needed (e.g. `README.md`, design docs)
